programme.title: Jackie Robinson (1919 – 1972)
programme.short_synopsis: A tribute to Jackie Robinson (1919 – 1972) the first black Major League baseball player.
programme.medium_synopsis: A tribute to Jackie Robinson (1919 – 1972) the first black Major League baseball player who ended racial segregation when he debuted with the Brooklyn Dodgers in 1947.
